item.title: 巴斯夫将出售中国新疆两家合资企业的股份
item.description: BASF said on Friday that it would sell its stakes in two joint ventures in Xinjiang, north-west China, a region where human rights groups have documented abuses including forced labour in detention camps.翻译:巴斯夫周五表示，将出售其在中国西北部新疆的两家合资企业的股份，该地区的人权组织记录了包括拘留营强迫劳动在内的虐待行为。
item.author: Ludwig Burger

item.title: 总理表示希腊将提高“黄金签证”的投资价格
item.description: Greece is planning to further raise the investment threshold for "golden visas" to foreigners to 800,000 euros ($861,520) for real estate in cities and islands where demand is high, Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis said on Friday.翻译:希腊总理基里亚科斯·米佐塔基斯周五表示，希腊计划将外国人“黄金签证”的投资门槛进一步提高至80万欧元（861,520美元），以投资需求旺盛的城市和岛屿的房地产。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美银美林投资者在本周至周三抛售美国股票，买入中国股票
item.description: Investors dumped U.S. and real estate shares and bought Chinese stocks in the week to Wednesday, a report from Bank of America citing data from EPFR said on Friday, saying the China flows were likely driven by Chinese public funds.翻译:美国银行周五援引 EPFR 数据称，截至周三的一周内，投资者抛售美国股票和房地产股票，买入中国股票，称资金流入中国可能是由中国公共基金推动的。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾称与美国在南海举行联合演习
item.description: The Philippines and the United States conducted joint maritime exercises in the South China Sea on Friday, the Philippine military said, the latest round of drills underlining ongoing expansion of their defence ties.翻译:菲律宾军方表示，菲律宾和美国周五在南海举行了联合海上演习，最新一轮演习凸显了两国防务关系的持续扩展。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 亚洲黄金印度转向溢价，农历新年引发其他中心的买盘
item.description: Physical gold dealers in India charged premiums this week for the first time in four months encouraged by a pick-up in purchases as local prices eased, while the approaching Lunar New Year festival boosted activity in China and elsewhere.翻译:印度实物黄金交易商本周四个月来首次收取溢价，原因是当地价格下跌，购买量增加，而即将到来的农历新年提振了中国和其他地区的黄金活动。
item.author: Rajendra Jadhav, Harshit Verma

item.title: 早盘出价：华尔街保持创纪录水平，关注通胀修正
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 资生堂利润下滑，中国消费者低迷又成为受害者
item.description: Shiseido became the latest victim on Friday of a slowing Chinese economy that has battered earnings at many global consumer goods companies, when the Japanese cosmetics maker reported a 40% slide in annual earnings.翻译:上周五，资生堂成为中国经济放缓的最新受害者，这家日本化妆品制造商报告称，其年收益下滑了 40%，中国经济放缓已经打击了许多全球消费品公司的盈利。
item.author: Rocky Swift

item.title: 政策支持下1月份银行新增贷款创历史新高
item.description: New bank loans in China jumped by more than expected to an all-time high in January, as the central bank moved to shore up the sputtering economy, reinforcing expectations for more stimulus in the coming months.翻译:随着央行采取行动提振陷入困境的经济，中国一月份新增银行贷款增幅超出预期，创历史新高，强化了未来几个月出台更多刺激措施的预期。
item.author: Judy Hua, Kevin Yao

item.title: 在梅西强烈反对后，香港组织者将部分退还迈阿密国际队门票
item.description: The organiser of a highly anticipated Inter Miami match in Hong Kong last week, expected to star Lionel Messi, will give a 50% refund for tickets after widespread anger that the Argentine player did not take the field due to injury but played in Japan days later.翻译:上周在香港举行的一场备受期待的国际迈阿密比赛的组织者将给予 50% 的门票退款，此前阿根廷球员因伤没有上场，但几天后在日本踢球，引发了广泛的愤怒。 。
item.author: Farah Master, Jessie Pang

item.title: 爱马仕销售额超过奢侈品竞争对手，股价创历史新高
item.description: Hermes said it will further raise prices as its sales outpaced luxury competitors at the end of 2023, helping to lift shares in the Birkin bag maker to a record high.翻译:爱马仕表示，由于其销量将在 2023 年底超过奢侈品竞争对手，因此将进一步提高价格，从而帮助这家柏金包制造商的股价升至历史新高。
item.author: Mimosa Spencer

item.title: 普京对战争与和平、第三次世界大战和人工智能说了些什么？
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin spoke in an interview published on Friday about war and peace in Ukraine, the risks of advances in genetics and artificial intelligence and fears of a world war.翻译:俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京在周五发表的采访中谈到了乌克兰的战争与和平、遗传学和人工智能进步的风险以及对世界大战的担忧。
item.author: Guy Faulconbridge

item.title: 随着中国经济困境加剧，投资银行准备迎接更多亚洲裁员
item.description: Job cuts at western investment banks in Asia are expected to increase this year, headhunters and bankers said.翻译:猎头公司和银行家表示，今年西方投资银行在亚洲的裁员预计将增加。
item.author: Kane Wu, Selena Li

item.title: 百度与联想达成第三笔中国人工智能智能手机交易
item.description: China's Baidu has partnered with Lenovo to feature its generative artificial intelligence (AI) technology on Lenovo's smartphones, in the latest team up with a phone manufacturer as it seeks practical applications for its AI model.翻译:中国的百度与联想合作，在联想的智能手机上展示其生成式人工智能（AI）技术，这是与一家手机制造商的最新合作，旨在为其人工智能模型寻求实际应用。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 独家：杜克能源将把中国电池巨头宁德时代从海军陆战队基地撤出
item.description: Under pressure from Congress, U.S. utility company Duke Energy plans to decommission energy-storage batteries produced by Chinese battery maker CATL at one of the nation's largest Marine Corps bases and will phase out CATL products at its civilian projects, the company confirmed to Reuters.翻译:美国公用事业公司杜克能源向路透社证实，在国会的压力下，该公司计划退役中国电池制造商宁德时代在美国最大的海军陆战队基地之一生产的储能电池，并将在其民用项目中逐步淘汰宁德时代的产品。
item.author: Michael Martina

item.title: 美元坚挺令金价承压，交易员寻求美联储线索，收益率走高
item.description: Gold prices were subdued on Friday, hurt by a stronger dollar and higher Treasury yields, while investors looked ahead to next week's U.S. inflation reading for clues on when the Federal Reserve could begin cutting interest rates.翻译:受美元走强和国债收益率上升的影响，周五金价走低，而投资者则期待下周的美国通胀数据，以寻找美联储何时开始降息的线索。
item.author: Sherin Varghese

item.title: 中国新年旅游高峰进入高潮，中国增加了创纪录的火车数量
item.description: China on Friday kicked into high gear on the eve of the annual Lunar New Year holiday, with travellers cramming onto trains and planes to head back to their hometowns and families preparing for traditional reunion dinner gatherings.翻译:周五，中国在一年一度的农历新年假期前夕进入了高潮，旅客们挤上火车和飞机返回家乡，与家人一起准备传统的团圆饭聚会。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着对中国的担忧加深，日产股价出现二十年来最大跌幅
item.description: Shares in Nissan Motor tumbled 12% on Friday, their biggest decline in more than two decades, after quarterly earnings undershot expectations by a large margin and it cut estimates for car sales due to stiff competition in China.翻译:日产汽车 (Nissan Motor) 的季度盈利大幅低于预期，并因中国竞争激烈而下调了汽车销量预期，周五该公司股价暴跌 12%，创二十多年来最大跌幅。
item.author: Daniel Leussink

item.title: 在美国通胀数据公布之前，华尔街股市提振
item.description: Wall Street headed for further gains on Friday after scaling new heights this week as looming U.S. inflation data will help investors calibrate how much further they may need to dial back on their rate cut bets.翻译:华尔街股市在本周创下新高后，周五进一步上涨，因为迫在眉睫的美国通胀数据将帮助投资者调整他们可能需要进一步削减降息押注的程度。
item.author: Huw Jones

item.title: 美国考虑采取限制措施将中国“智能汽车”拒之门外 - 彭博社
item.description: The Biden administration is considering restricting imports of Chinese "smart cars" and related components amid growing U.S. concerns about data security, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.翻译:彭博社周四援引知情人士的话报道称，由于美国对数据安全的担忧日益加剧，拜登政府正在考虑限制进口中国“智能汽车”及相关零部件。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 比特币上涨5%至一个月来最高
item.description: Bitcoin rose 5% on Friday to its highest in a month, marching back towards the level it reached in January on the back of optimism after the first U.S. listed spot bitcoin exchange traded products received regulatory approval.翻译:比特币周五上涨 5%，达到一个月来的最高水平，在美国上市的第一个现货比特币交易所交易产品获得监管部门批准后的乐观情绪的支持下，比特币回到了 1 月份达到的水平。
item.author: Reuters
